article_title: Gunmen Execute 15 Minority Shia Muslims in Afghanistan
article_text:
KABUL—Gunmen in central Afghanistan executed 15 civilians belonging to the Shiite Muslim minority, a rare sectarian attack in a country struggling with intense political violence.

Shortly after 12 a.m. Friday, armed men stopped three minibuses carrying civilians through Ghor province and ordered all 32 passengers off the vehicles, Afghan officials said. After checking their identification cards, the assailants separated the ethnic...
